lawnlayer

Class Agent

  • java.lang.Object
    • lawnlayer.GameObject
      • lawnlayer.Agent
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Enemy, Player, Powerup

    public class Agent
extends GameObject
    Represents a game object that actively performs some actions.

        Keeps the agent within the game area if it moves beyond boundaries.

      • getTile

        public TileObject getTile(TileObject[] allTileObjects)
        Gets the tile where the agent is currently located in.
        Parameters:
        allTileObjects - all tile objects on screen
        Returns:
        the agent's tile

      • getSurroundingTiles

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,TileObject> getSurroundingTiles(TileObject[][] map,
                                                                           TileObject agentTile)
        Get surrounding 8 tiles of the agent.

        1 2 3

        4 o 5

        6 7 8

        At the 4 walls and 4 corners of the tilemap, surrounding tiles on the same side cannot be obtained (e.g.at right wall, tile 3,5,8 cannot be obtained).

        Parameters:
        map - the tilemap of this game
        agentTile - the agent's tile
        Returns:
        the agent's surrounding 8 tiles in a HashMap
